alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL WYOMING AND ALLEGANY COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Canisteo to near Wellsville to 7 miles north of Shinglehouse. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alfred, Belfast, Cuba, Rushford, Houghton, Caneadea, Friendship, Scio, Bolivar, Andover, Belmont, Angelica, Canaseraga, Almond, Richburg, West Almond, Birdsall, Short Tract, Fillmore, and Swain. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 28 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
